meanings.definition: A small amount of food eaten between meals.
meanings.sent1: After school, I always have a snack like an apple or crackers.
meanings.sent2: My favorite snack is popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent3: I tried to hide my snack from my little brother, but he found it in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a delightful snack for my soul.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the room, tempting me to grab a snack.

meanings.sent1: I like to snack on carrots when I feel hungry between meals.
meanings.sent2: She tends to snack on chips while studying for exams.
meanings.sent3: My cat always tries to snack on my shoelaces when I'm not looking.
meanings.sent4: The waves snacked on the sandy shore, slowly eroding it away.
meanings.sent5: As the hiker snacked on his trail mix, he enjoyed the peaceful sounds of nature around him.
